problem_summary_simple: Design a stack that pops the most frequent element, breaking ties by proximity to the top.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a frequency map and a map of frequencies to lists of elements to efficiently retrieve the most frequent element.
key_insights: The core idea is to group elements by their frequency.
When popping, we target the highest frequency group and take the most recently added element.
Maintaining `maxfreq` allows direct access to the relevant group.
